content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello, Mr. Li. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure we can come to an agreement that suits both our needs. Let's discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine. I'm looking for a monthly rate that reflects the size of the apartment and the amenities provided. I'm open to discussing a price that is fair for both parties. Would you be able to offer a lower rate considering the size of the apartment is 25 square meters?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I understand your perspective, Mr. Li. The size of the apartment is certainly a factor in the rental price. However, I must also consider the cost of utilities and maintenance. I am willing to negotiate, but I must ensure that the final price is fair for both parties. What is the maximum amount you are willing to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I appreciate your consideration, Mr. Heine. As a student, I'm looking to keep my expenses low, so I would like to pay no more than 700 Euros per month. This would include all utilities and maintenance costs. Is this something we can discuss further?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Your offer of 700 Euros per month is an interesting starting point, Mr. Li. However, I must inform you that the utilities and maintenance costs are not included in the rent. These are additional expenses that you would have to cover. Are you open to discussing a price that includes these additional costs?
name: Heinrich Heine
